pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Formula Pregnancy Massage Lotion For Stretch Marks 250mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Massage Lotion for Stretch Marks helps visibly improve skin elasticity and reduces the appearance of stretch marks. Dermatologist tested and safe for use during pregnancy.

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Massage Lotion for Stretch Marks contains Pure Cocoa Butter and Shea Butter, Natural Oils, Collagen, Elastin and Lutein to keep skin moisturised and supple for 48 hours, allowing skin to stretch more easily. Widely recommended for stretch marks during and after pregnancy or weight fluctuation. This non-greasy lotion is ideal for all over body use, in place of your regular moisturiser. Clinically proven. Over 98% of women saw improved skin elasticity, texture and tone.*Based on an 8 week in-home trial by 102 female panelists aged 18 to 49. Hypoallergenic

Suitable For: Sensitive skin

Product Claims: Helps reduce the appearance of stretch marks

Recommended By: Dermatologist

Size: 250mL

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

Dermatologically Approved?: Yes

Hypo Allergenic?: Yes

Skin Type: Sensitive

KEY FEATURES

• Clinically proven to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks
• Safe for use during pregnancy
• Hypoallergenic
• Dermatologist tested
• Non greasy formula
• Suitable for sensitive skin
• Free of mineral oil, parabens and phthalates

Warnings

Skin sensitivity heightens during pregnancy. We advise testing this and all skin care products on a small area, such as the inner forearm, 48 hours before first use. Do not use if signs of irritation or rash appear. After using the product, if irritation or rash appears, discontinue use. If irritation or rash persists, consult your doctor.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Glyceryl Stearate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond Oil), Petrolatum, Cetyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Soluble Collagen, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Centella Asiatica Extract, Betula Alba Bark Extract, Boswellia Serrata Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Sodium Ascorbate, Acetylaringyltryptophyl Diphenylglycine, Sodium Benzoate, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2 Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthophylls, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Glucose, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Isopropyl Alcohol, PEG-8 Stearate, Ethyl Lauroyl Arginate HCI, Fragrance (Parfum), Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Butylene Glycol, Caramel, Cellulose, Sodium Acetate, Stearyl Alcohol, Myristyl Alcohol, Lauryl Alcohol.

Contains: Collagen, Elastin, Argan Oil, Shea Butter

Directions

For best results use in place of your regular body moisturiser twice daily as soon as you discover you are pregnant, until after baby is born. Apply all over body, paying special attention to tummy, breasts, thighs, hips & buttocks. Massage liberally into skin twice daily.
